text: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allah are those who have disbelieved, and they will not [ever] believe -
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya binatang (makhluk) yang paling buruk di sisi Allah ialah orang-orang yang kafir, karena mereka itu tidak beriman.
